concept.title: Portal Manager
concept.shortdesc: The console where you set up and manage your custom Developer Portal.

section.title: Overview
section.p: You can make your APIs accessible to users outside the SnapLogic ecosystem.

The following API Management components are available to Org administrator:
Portal Manager. The administrative console where Org administrators can manage the lifecycle of APIs. Org administrators also use the Portal Manager to create and customize the Developer Portal where APIs are published.
Developer Portal. The customizable public-facing page that showcase your APIs to the public.
section.note: Only Org Admins can publish, unpublish, deprecate, or retire APIs.
